page.title: 05DALRY CIVIC COUNCIL
page.content: The Civic Council in Dalry started in 1974.Their job involves sports, outings,discos,music and computer clubs for youth who had nothing to do in their spare time At Christmas the Music Club had a concert in aid of Dr.Barnardos Homes. Some ofThe Civic Council think that the job prospects are not good therefore youth organisations are very important. The Council meetings are held once a month in the Community Centre in Dalry, attended by about twenty five people.A new Council is chosen each year.The Council is elected by a person being proposed and then the people that attend the meeting vote for the person they think most suitable.
